attributes.review:
i downloaded this app to what all the boomers are talking about and this app is completely horrible. it took hours to finally download.😤 this app doesn't help me what so ever in any way it's pretty much worthless! i will NEVER download this app again! 😌✌️👺

love you fellow tiktokians✨
attributes.title: rumpty dumpty😌✨

attributes.review: This app is terrible constantly crashing now I know why boomers don’t like social media because they can’t make it work 🤭😤 In the end I do not recommend getting this app it’s awful giving you useless information!
attributes.title: AWFUL APP

attributes.review: This app took 3 hours to download😗I just wanted to support our 🍊Rasist president🥺💕Hate this app,Do NOT download unless you wanna not do anything else but watch this app download❤️You can’t turn off your phone OR stop the downloading✨I would not recommend🙄
attributes.title: 1 star! Horrible!!✌️

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded! I got a virus from downloading this and getting this app takes a lot of space and it ain’t worth it. So I’m saving you from getting a virus and from wasting space on ur phone. Xoxo-Hispanic lives matter ✌🏻
attributes.title: Worst app ever! Don’t download.

attributes.review: this app took 4 months to download. i saw people from tiktok saying how amazing it is but they were all lies. as soon as it got done downloading my phone blew up into little pieces!!!! i had to get a new one which was so annoying. would NOT recommend.
attributes.title: No

attributes.review: I used to like trump as a president but he just isn’t doing what he promised. He said he would make America great again but when was it great. Also he is very rude to people and I do not think that is ok. And for me at the moment he is not in my favor.
attributes.title: He used to be a good president

attributes.review: this app made my phone glitch. now i can’t even call my son who is in the hospital. i now need to get a new phone and i can’t afford to. it’s either a phone or my house bills being paid. thanks a lot trump i hate you✨🧚
attributes.title: Absolutely atrocious

attributes.review:
This app is worst app ever after I downloaded it my phone was glitching, getting hacked and all my personal information was gone and sent to the government!!!!!!!!!!!! President 🍊even sent me pics!!!!!!!! Apple please delete this app!🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! I was ready to show my undying support for President Trump, but this HORRIBLE app is dangerous! It loaded, I opened it up, and it summoned A DEMON FROM HELL! I was raised in a good white Christian household, and I DO NOT DESERVE THIS! The demon has made itself at home now, eating my Ben and Jerry’s, drinking my coffee. God can’t hear me now, only this evil parasite from Hell. IT BURNED MY PRECIOUS BIBLE! NO! DO NOT GET THE TRUMP 2020 APP!
attributes.title: made in HELL

attributes.review: After it took 3 days to download, I got into the app! I had to make an account, that sucked a lot!!! Once I got in a was pretty happy to see what was going on! Then I saw something about Trump meeting aliens I knew it wasn’t real! Do Not Download!!
attributes.title: This whole app is fake news!
